sources.title: Tell Me in the Sunlight (1967) STEVE COCHRAN
sources.description:
♥ 1st TIME on YouTUBE ♥
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Writer/Director: Steve Cochran
Stars: Steve Cochran, Shary Marshall, Jay Robinson, Jill Walden, and Dave Bondu Sr.

It's rough seas ahead when a merchant seaman falls for an exotic dancer on a Caribeean island.

TRIVIA: The swan song of Steve Cochran. Filmed in 1964, but not released for several years following his mysterious death in 1965.

metadata.Plot: On the coast of Nassau in the Bahamas, an American cargo sailor on leave picks up a beautiful exotic dancer for a casual fling, but falls in love with her in spite of having just met her. She seems to feel the same way for him, but she already has a boyfriend. This leads to an awkward and unpredictable love triangle that could become dangerous.
metadata.Writer: Steve Cochran, Jo Heims, Robert Stevens
metadata.Actors: Steve Cochran, Shary Marshall, Jay Robinson
